content: k2tog k1 needle 2 work as needle 1 repeat toe decrease 1 every other round until 18 20 22 24 sts rem total toe decrease 2 needle 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts rem k2tog k1 needle 2 work as needle 1 repeat toe decrease 2 every round until 12 12 16 16 sts rem total 6 6 8 8 sts per needle finishing cut yarn leaving a 12 / 30 cm tail and using a tapestry needle graft sts together using the kitchener stitch gently soak and block socks and weave in all ends wear on full moons helpful links long tail tubular cast on german twisted cast on kitchener stitch © dawn henderson page �6 of �8 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com asali socks charts size 1 size 2 © dawn henderson page �7 of �8 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com asali socks charts size 3 size 4 © dawn henderson page �8 of �8 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com
